title: Provincial Court Family Law Act Protection Order

elements.name: RespondentLiveTogether
elements.title: Does the protected party(ies) ({protectedPartyName}) currently share a residence with {RespondentName}?
elements.description: Even if one of you has left your residence (home or place you are living) temporarily, you still share a residence.

elements.name: needPolice
elements.title: I believe police assistance may be required for the following purposes:

choices.value: To remove the other party from the shared residence
choices.text: To remove the other party from the shared residence

choices.value: To supervise the removal of the protected party's personal belongings from the shared residence
choices.text: To supervise the removal of the protected party's personal belongings from the shared residence

choices.value: To supervise the removal of the other party's personal belongings from the shared residence
choices.text: To supervise the removal of the other party's personal belongings from the shared residence

choices.value: To supervise the removal of the child(ren)'s personal belongings from a residence
choices.text: To supervise the removal of the child(ren)'s personal belongings from a residence
